Text:
Audio Tracks are all demuxed, so download the ones you want.
Use MPC (   http://cccp-project.net/   ) to automatically recognize & play the external Audio tracks or mux the Audio in MKV with  mkvmerge 
(   http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix   ) if you wish to use other player.

If you only chose English Audio tracks + mkv-s,
you only download 3.6 GB total.

One more thing:
The rips where encoded from DVD9(5.7-7.2GB) and they have better picture then DVD5-s (4.3 GB).
